question: What is maintenance fluid per hour requirement for 60 kg adult:-
exp: Per hour requirement of maintainance fliuid - 4-2-1 For 1st 10 kg = 4ml/kg bw For 2nd 10 kg = 2ml/kg bw For rest body weight = 1 ml / kg bw
